name: Starry Sprouts
description:
Starry Sprouts is my final project made for school. This game is a demo for my art! Art is the main focus of my game, so don't expect too much of the design of the game!

In Starry Sprouts, you play as a moth. One day, you'll discover that your pets ran away, and you need to go find them! Jump into the book and discover a magical world where you can find your pet! 

This game is only playable on Windows, and you can play it with keyboard, PS4 controller or Xbox!

Music from https://www.zapsplat.com
